actions.description: Creates a file in the temporary directory on the filesystem. Returns the created directory's full path.
actions.name: createTempDir

outputSchema.description: The full path of the created directory.
The full path of the created directory.

actions.title: Create Temp Directory

outputSchema.description: The full path of the created directory.

actions.description: Gets the path of the parent folder of the file. If the file doesn't exist, it throws an error.
actions.name: getFilePath

outputSchema.description: The path of the parent folder of the file.
The path of the parent folder of the file.

actions.title: Get Parent Folder

actions.description: Lists the content of a directory for the given path.
actions.name: ls
actions.title: List

actions.description: Reads all data from a specified file path and outputs it in file entry format.
actions.name: readFile

properties.description: The path of the file to read.
properties.label: File path
properties.name: filename

actions.title: Read File

actions.description: Permanently removes the content of a directory.
actions.name: rm

outputSchema.description: Indicates whether the directory was removed or not.
Indicates whether the directory was removed or not.

actions.title: Remove

properties.description: File entry object to be written.
properties.label: File Entry

properties.description: The path to which the file should be written.
